subtitle: A crucial step in digital identity management, ensuring authenticity and trust across platforms.
body:
• Confirms the legitimate ownership of an L25 alias.
  • Prevents unauthorized use and identity spoofing.
  • Typically involves cryptographic proofs or multi-factor authentication.
  • Enhances overall system security and user trust.
  • Critical for maintaining data integrity and compliance.
rich_content:
